body.p:
Battle Field Near Perryville Ky
Oct. 11. 1862.
His Excellency Gov Robinson

The following appointments are recommended to be made in the 15 Rgt Ky Vols Capt. M. C. Taylor Co A to be Lt. Col Vice Geo. P. Jouett Killed, Capt. J. R. Snider, to be Major vice W. P. Campbell Killed 2d Lt F. Hinlock to be Capt. of Co. A. Vice M. C. Taylor promoted, Sgt. Henry M. Lyle to be 1st Lieut of Co A Vice Lt. McGrath killed Sgt. ^J. P. L^ Artherton to be 2d Lt. vice F. A. Winlock promoted. Lt W. H. Harrison Co. B. to be Capt. vice J. R. Snider to be promoted 2d Lt. Jas. Wesley Gray to be 1st. Lt. vice. W. H. Harrison to be promoted Richd. Foster to be 2d Lieut vice Jas, Wesley Gray to be promoted

Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Srvt
C. Pope
Col. 15th Regt Ky Vols

Cincinnti Oct 1
Gov. Robinson
Louisville
Ky
